# Interactive component

## Distribution of crime across Boroughs

We are using this interactive bar graph to understand the trends of different kinds of offenses and crimes in each borough. To view the results for a particular offense, select the offense type from the drop down. 

The X Axis depicts different boroughs and the Y Axis depicts number of arrests for that offense.
